message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to our negotiation.
You wanted 50/50, I'll give you 60/40, but I'm not getting taken advantage of!
60/40 is still not good enough, I want a better deal!
I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're not giving up enough, I'll take a smaller share, but I'm not going to give you all the power!
Alright, I'll take the deal. 450,000 is a good compromise!
